snippet: Tech geeks offer a statistical crystal ball on Mitt Romney's vice-presidential pick, by monitoring the volume of edits on a contender's page.
abstract: Tech geeks offer a statistical crystal ball on Mitt Romney's vice-presidential pick, by monitoring the volume of edits on a contender's page.

headline.main: Romney's Running Mate? Some Say Wikipedia Holds the Answer
headline.print_headline: The Running Mate: Reading the Tea Leaves In the Pages of Wikipedia
